Description:
A home to impress, entertain and enjoy
Expressions of Interest by Thursday 3 April at 5pm (Unless Sold Prior)
In a quiet cul-de-sac near Yarrunga Reserve, this single-level home has been renovated and extended with integrity and style, offering a lifestyle of comfort and entertainment. Sydney Blue Gum polished floors grace the entrance and family room, while the bedrooms and formal lounge are lushly carpeted.
Accessing the family and lounge rooms, the updated kitchen features Caesarstone benchtops and stainless steel appliances (gas cooktop, wall oven and a dishwasher). Featuring concealed robes, this elegant bedroom adjoins an indulgent, fully-tiled bathroom with a bath, walk-in rain shower and a TV.
Further inclusions: ducted heating and ducted refrigerated cooling system, Jindara wood heater, powder room, dual hot water systems (1 instant), surround sound capabilities, well-appointed laundry and a garden shed. Walk to Croydon Hills Primary School via Yarrunga Reserve at the end of the court, close to buses, Settlers Orchard, Candlebark Walk and Mc Adam Square shops and cafe, plus sought-after schools including Croydon Hills Primary School, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and Rudolf Steiner.
* Sumptuous full ensuite
* Central heating and cooling
* Fantastic covered alfresco deck
* 2 living areas
* Sydney Blue Gum polished floors

Sale by Negotiation
An entertainer's dream is perhaps the most apt way to describe this tastefully renovated four-bedroom home.
